results.title: Configure Sentry for Single sign-on with Microsoft Entra ID - Microsoft Entra ID
results.description: Configure Sentry for Single sign-on with Microsoft Entra ID In this article,  you learn how to integrate Sentry with Microsoft Entra ID. When you integrate Sentry with Microsoft Entra ID, you can: Control in Microsoft Entra ID who has access to SentrySentry supports SP and IDP initiated SSO Sentry supports Just In Time user provisioning Adding.
